name: Bullet Bastards
description:
My entry to the Bullet Hell Jam 2022

Lot of options regarding conrols: you can use a gamepad, keyboard, or keyboard and mouse:

  • Left stick. D-Pad and WASD moves the ship
  • Right stick, A,B,X,Y (Gamepad) and arrow keys (keyboard) and mouse aim, aims the ship
  • Right shoulder and trigger, left shoulder and trigger buttons, space bar and left click shoots
  • You have a limited stock of bullets, you regain them if you pick them up or kill an enemy
  • Have fun!

This is super basic, no menu or title screen or anything like that, its for a game jam, I don't have time for that nice stuff xD
